Name: Grotle Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Turtwig, Grotle, and Torterra.  Swap a Grotle Twig and a Grotle Claw for a Grotle Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
